statements.select: select t.I_INTID, t.I_RECOGNITIONSTATUS, t.C_CONTAINERTIME, t.C_CONTAINERNO, t.C_PLANCONTAINERNO, t.C_CREATETIME, t.C_CREATEUSERNAME, t.C_PONDNO from SM_Container_Rate t order by t.C_CREATETIME desc

select t.I_INTID, t.I_RECOGNITIONSTATUS, t.C_CONTAINERTIME, t.C_CONTAINERNO, t.C_PLANCONTAINERNO, t.C_CREATETIME, t.C_CREATEUSERNAME, t.C_PONDNO from SM_Container_Rate t where 1=1
t.C_PONDNO=#PondNo#
t.C_CONTAINERNO=#ContainerNo#
t.C_CREATETIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
order by t.C_CREATETIME desc

select coalesce(A.磅房,B.磅房) 磅房, (coalesce(A.SuccessCount,0)+coalesce(B.FailCount,0)) 总数, coalesce(A.SuccessCount,0) as 识别成功数量, coalesce(B.FailCount,0) as 识别失败数量, coalesce(round(A.SuccessCount/(coalesce(A.SuccessCount,0)+coalesce(B.FailCount,0))*100,2),0)||'%' 成功率 from (select count(t.i_recognitionstatus) as SuccessCount, t.C_PONDNO 磅房编号, p.c_poundsitename 磅房 from SM_Container_Rate t left join SM_PoundSite_Info p on t.C_PONDNO=p.C_PoundSiteNo where t.i_recognitionstatus=1
t.C_PONDNO=#PondNo#
t.C_CONTAINERNO=#ContainerNo#
t.C_CREATETIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
group by t.C_PONDNO,p.c_poundsitename order by t.c_pondno ) A full join ( select count(t.i_recognitionstatus) as FailCount, t.C_PONDNO 磅房编号, p.c_poundsitename 磅房 from SM_Container_Rate t left join SM_PoundSite_Info p on t.C_PONDNO=p.C_PoundSiteNo where t.i_recognitionstatus=0
t.C_PONDNO=#PondNo#
t.C_CONTAINERNO=#ContainerNo#
t.C_CREATETIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
group by t.C_PONDNO,p.c_poundsitename order by t.c_pondno ) B on A.磅房编号=B.磅房编号
statements.insert:
select SEQ_SM_CONTAINER_RATE.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into SM_Container_Rate ( I_INTID, I_RECOGNITIONSTATUS, C_CONTAINERTIME, C_CONTAINERNO, C_PLANCONTAINERNO, C_CREATETIME, C_CREATEUSERNAME, C_PONDNO )values ( #IntId#, #I_RecognitionStatus#, #C_ContainerTime#, #C_ContainerNo#, #C_PlanContainerNo#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #C_CreateUserName#, #C_PondNo# )
